title: ClosedStateEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify what led to the contract or execution closure.

oneOf.title: Allocated
oneOf.description: The execution or contract has been allocated.

oneOf.title: Cancelled
oneOf.description: The execution or contract has been cancelled.

oneOf.title: Expired
oneOf.description: The (option) contract has expired without being exercised.

oneOf.title: Matured
oneOf.description: The contract has reached its contractual termination date.

oneOf.title: Novated
oneOf.description: The contract has been novated. This state applies to the stepped-out contract component of the novation event.

oneOf.title: Terminated
oneOf.description: The contract has been subject of an early termination event.
